name: Hot Barrels
description:
Description

Hot Barrels was a submission for the GMTK 2020 Jam, the Jam's theme  was 'Out of Control'. Hot Barrels fits this theme as the gun in the game is not under your control, but fires automatically after you've moved!

Hot Barrels is a puzzle game where you fire after 3 turns, your goal is to kill the enemy tanks, but watch out as they fire back!

Controls

- 'WASD' to move around the tiles.

- 'R' to reset the level.
